Detailed Description

This class represents a TinyJava NEW expression (used for array creation).

A NewExpression is represented by:

  • the constructed type (i.e. array base type)
  • an Expression representing the size of the array to be created

int  tp,
Expression *  size 
) [inline]

Create a new NewExpression object

Parameters:
lno a source line number containing the new expression
tp the type of the created value (array base type), as defined in the AstNode class
size a pointer to Expression representing the size of the new array
Exceptions:
AstException if the size Expression is NULL
